sent.orig: Crowd density estimation is very important to building designs and crowd safety.
sent.trans: 人群的密度估计对于建筑物的设计和人群安全至关重要。

sent.orig: The Psionicist excels at crowd control, and has a number of crowd control abilities.
sent.trans: 心灵术士在群体控制方面是最强的，拥有很多群体控制技能。

sent.orig: Crowd density estimation is the important content of intelligent crowd surveillance.
sent.trans: 人群密度监测是智能化人群监控中十分重要的内容。

sent.orig: But when you hold me near, you drown out the crowd (the crowd).
sent.trans: 但是你近距离的拥抱淹没了吵杂的人群。

sent.orig: The man who follows the crowd will never be followed by a crowd.
sent.trans: 跟着一大群人的人不可能被一群人跟着（不可能成为领导人物）。
